# 全栈增长工程师实战

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/quanzhan-zengchang-gongchengshi-shizhan
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/quanzhan-zengchang-gongchengshi-shizhan
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install quanzhan-zengchang-gongchengshi-shizhan
quanzhan-zengchang-gongchengshi-shizhan <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g quanzhan-zengchang-gongchengshi-shizhan
quanzhan-zengchang-gongchengshi-shizhan <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
